alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 04 at 2:16PM MDT until April 05 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations up to an inch below 5500 feet, to include McCall and Cascade. Above 5500 feet additional accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with up to 9 inches across higher peaks. A rain/snow mix below 5500 feet this afternoon will change back to all snow tonight. Winds gusting to 45 mph in mountain valleys with gusts to 55 mph at higher elevations this afternoon and early evening. * WHERE...West Central Mountains and Boise Mountains zones. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially over mountain passes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and power outages are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
